name: HEALTH CARE

name: QUALIFIED DOCTORS

description: There are highly graduated qualified doctors. They will check your body problem and give you proper treatment and medicines.

name: OUR PATIENT SERVICES
short_des: THESE SERVICES OUR PATIENT GET FROM US
description: We always care about aour patient. We give a specific amount of discount to our patient. And also the medicines can be found in the pharmacy.

description: We have this unit for emergency situation.This unit is opened 24/7. Our duty doctors are always for your help.

name: LAB TEST REPORTS

name: VISITING HOURS
